com.cerner.beadledom.resteasy

Class ResteasyContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.servlet.ResteasyBootstrap
      • com.cerner.beadledom.resteasy.ResteasyContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleContainer, EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public abstract class ResteasyContextListener
extends org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.servlet.ResteasyBootstrap
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, LifecycleContainer
    A base context listener for Resteasy that provides lifecycle support via Governator.

    When using this context listener the ResteasyModule must also be registered with guice to provide some required bindings.

    Author:
    John Leacox
